Discover our tailor-made, comprehensive Property Management packages

Our tailor-made, comprehensive Property Management package is an essential part of our lettings service. We provide a full range of specialist assistance for an affordable fee. Our clients can choose between two packages Basic and Premier. Customised solutions can be offered as well upon consultation. After finding you the right tenant(s), we look after you, your property or your building, and the tenant(s) through the term of the tenancy.

We understand that we are dealing with people’s homes and therefore our staff are not only professional and RERA qualified, but also empathetic when dealing with personal matters.

Mortgage

Mortgage means borrowing against a security of real estate. The main factors that have an impact on a bank’s decision to grant a mortgage in the UAE are as follows:

  • Borrower’s age and status. A mortgage can be taken out if you are at least 21 years old and no older than 60 years (for salaried employees) or 70 years old (if you have your own business)
  • Borrower’s age and status. A mortgage can be taken out if you are at least 21 years old and no older than 60 years (for salaried employees) or 70 years old (if you have your own business)
  • Borrower’s age and status. A mortgage can be taken out if you are at least 21 years old and no older than 60 years (for salaried employees) or 70 years old (if you have your own business)
